title: Compositio Mathematica
summary: Compositio Mathematica is a monthly peer-reviewed mathematics journal established by L.E.J. Brouwer in 1935.[1] It is owned by the Foundation Compositio Mathematica, and since 2004 it has been published on behalf of the Foundation by the London Mathematical Society in partnership with Cambridge University Press. According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2020 2-year impact factor of 1.456 and a 2020 5-year impact factor of 1.696.[2]
